Youth Ambassador Profile



Purpose Statement

Nowadays, many teens may struggle with depression and parents may not pay enough attention to the issue of teen depression or its potential causes. With my project, I hope to help educate parents so that they can give their teenage children the care they need, especially if these youths are suffering from depression.


Final Project: "Teen Depression"
